Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Fèng zhìrén zhì cí de zhēnzhǔ zhī míng
yīqiè zànsòng, quán guīzhēnzhǔ, quán shìjiè de zhǔ
Wǒmen zhǐ chóngbài nǐ, zhǐ qiú nǐ yòuzhù
qiú nǐ yǐndǎo wǒmen shàng zhènglù
nǐ suǒ yòuzhù zhě de lù, bùshì shòu qiǎn nù zhě de lù, yě bùshì mí wù zhě de lù
